scripts.start:dev:watch-all: docker compose -f docker-compose-dev.yml -f docker/docker-compose-live-proto.yml -f docker/docker-compose-live-packages.yml watch --no-up
scripts.start:dev:up-all: docker compose -f docker-compose-dev.yml -f docker/docker-compose-live-proto.yml -f docker/docker-compose-live-packages.yml up
scripts.gen-proto: pnpm --filter juno-proto install && pnpm --filter juno-proto build
scripts.test:e2e:auth-service-live: AUTH_COMMAND=test:e2e:watch RUN_MODE=test pnpm start:dev:live-all --exit-code-from auth-service auth-service
scripts.test:e2e:email-service-live: EMAIL_COMMAND=test:e2e:watch RUN_MODE=test pnpm start:dev:live-all --exit-code-from email-service email-service
